title: Embroidered Picture, mid-19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton, wool, silk
Technique: counted stitch embroidery on plain weave
description: Woman holding a small bouquet of flowers stands behind a basket of flowers. To the left is a small dog. The scene is framed by a pillar on the right and a tree on the left. The facade of a house against the sky in the background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidered Picture, mid-19th century.Medium: cotton, wool, silk
Technique: counted stitch embroidery on plain weave. 1974-84-1.
